unit.utterance: qːajakentlij hejkaguda agurda ʡaˁbdulχaliq'ra ʡisaq'adira, dura nišːala qːulluqaj
unit.utterance_translation: In Kajakent, from there we travelled, Abdukhalik, Isakadi and me, for our work.

unit.utterance: c'il hextːud itːu dičibda, ištːu dičibda, nišːalla qːulluqːe darq'ibda
unit.utterance_translation: Back then (we) went here and there for our work.

unit.utterance: heχkade tːurahadeʁible, heštːi qulballa meržewanie birq'an ce hehe qːajakentla kolcewojla hej šːalleb cab, hej, [CROSSTALK] palantalla dokumente dirq'an, meržewanie birq'an musːa hextːub cab
unit.utterance_translation: From there we went away to where they make the topographical surveys for properties [of land], that is at the side of the Kajakent roundabout, the place where they make the documents for the parcels [properties] that is there.

unit.utterance: ʡisaq'adi ik'ʷar... ʡisaq'adila itwajra qːulluqːe ahadurχːu, it wečna činak'al tːurawqutːel, ja juldašːe, ja qːulluqːe kam abirχʷar
unit.utterance_translation: Isakadi says, Isakadi is like this, he has always work that does not finish, he always goes everywhere, neither his friends nor his work diminish.

unit.utterance: c'il caw ʡaˁħ juldaš cawi nišːalla, nu, heχ q'ʷila q'ʷila iχicːeb χasijat χebil cab
unit.utterance_translation: He is our good friend, but he has a bit of a habit like that.

unit.utterance: heštu mašin t'ašaʁa ik'ʷar, hextːu wergulda ik'ʷar du
unit.utterance_translation: "Stop the car here!" he says, "I'll go in there."

unit.utterance: ijra dura tːurad kelgunda heχtːu kadicːurre
unit.utterance_translation: And him [Abdukhalik] and me were left behind, standing outside there.

unit.utterance: erdik'ulda, χuzmag lebde qːuʁace kabicːurre
unit.utterance_translation: We look around and see a shop for household goods, nicely located there.

unit.utterance: wašekːʷa, ik'ʷar, ce k'ebil, erdurk'anda, ik'ʷar, tukenneb
unit.utterance_translation: "Let's go and look what's in that shop there," he says.

unit.utterance: waš, waš, dihaduqunda
unit.utterance_translation: We went and entered the shop.

unit.utterance: na hel tukenčira ʡaˁħce xunul admi lerde, qːuʁace
unit.utterance_translation: And the shop assistant was a beautiful, nice woman.

unit.utterance: nu ʁajkarik'ul, heχ ʡurus ʁajlade ʁajkarik'ʷan carra, nišːij balχulakːu čadel it k'araqandel it, qːumuqlandel it
unit.utterance_translation: And she is talking, talking in Russian, and we do not know what she was, Avar or Kumyk.

unit.utterance: [AUDIENCE] xozjajstvennyj magazinde, dihaduqunne iχtilatdik'ulda
unit.utterance_translation: [AUDIENCE] This was a household goods shop, we entered and talked.

unit.utterance: ha heltːud kadišːible qːuʁate skuče ledde
unit.utterance_translation: There were beautiful scotch adhesive tapes put aside.

unit.utterance: nu raznyj cwetla,... na hež ʁunabte rugtera ledde
unit.utterance_translation: Of various colors, brown, green, coloured, various; they were like this, round.

unit.utterance: harikːʷa ʔibda, abuχarre, ʔibda, ca skuč asːa, ʔibda, at
unit.utterance_translation: "Go", I say, "Buy one roll of tape for yourself."

unit.utterance: c'ili, dam ce barq'idaja ik'ʷar heχ
unit.utterance_translation: He says, "What should I do with this?"

unit.utterance: dul haʔibda, hel berčːibqːel t'irt'irik'ulde, haʔibda het... cek'u tːutːule čibasːij haʔibda heχ [LAUGHTER]
unit.utterance_translation: I said, "when you are drunk and you are talking and talking, stick this on your, whatsit, your mouth", I said.

unit.utterance: c'il, c'il du ik'ʷar berčːible t'irt'irik'ulda, ik'ʷar, u trezvyj ik'ulde, ik'ʷar, at asːa, ik'ʷar il
unit.utterance_translation: He says, "I chatter when I am drunk and you are chattering when you are sober, so buy it for yourself!"

unit.utterance: hel zamana hel xunul darkːʷan ružible hel tukanči
unit.utterance_translation: At that time it turned out that the woman was Dargi, the shop assistant.

unit.utterance: itil darq'ib ħaˁħaˁ hadirʁanne c'il
unit.utterance_translation: How much she laughed!

unit.utterance: hellelej, rik'ʷar, ʡaˁžeb, ʡaˁħ χalq' leddaq'al rik'ʷar [LAUGHTER]
unit.utterance_translation: "Well," she says, "you are surprising, good people", she says.

unit.utterance: wallah, ʁubza hel xunul admil c'aq'le ħaˁħaˁ darq'ib itil [LAUGHTER]
unit.utterance_translation: By God, that woman laughed very much.
